column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ hom du hom tsenabew asaase a medze rema hom no do
column13: anaa hom afahyɛ a wɔahyɛ no mu
column14: dze eyi nka huanhuam ama EWURADZE a ofi anantwi

column2: "ɔno nyia ɔdze n’ayɛyɛdze ba no
column3: ɔmfa edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor nka ngo  hin   ebupɛn anan mu kor ho mbrɛ EWURADZE:"

column2: "na ɔnom afɔr wenyin
column3: hin   ebupɛn anan mu kor
column5: anaa okum afɔr eguambaa kor ho siesie."

column2: "Na oguannyin dze
column3: fa isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo  hin   ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor afrɔw

column2: "na ɔnom afɔr no fa wenyin  hin   ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor bra
column3: ma onyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔnantwisaa na irisiesie abɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column3: anaa okum afɔr
column5: anaa edze robɔbɔ asomdwee afɔr ama EWURADZE a:"

column2: "ɔno edziban afɔr a ɔmfa nka ɔnantwisaa no ho nye isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebiasa a wɔdze ngo  hin   ɔfa afrɔw."
"Na fa wenyin  hin   ɔfa yɛ ɔnom afɔr no bra bɔbɔ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE."
"Dɛm na wɔnyɛ ɔnantwisaa kor
column3: anaa oguannyin kor

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ dodow a hom besiesie no tse no
column3: dɛmara na hom nyɛ no nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse."

column2: "Ekuromfo nyinara nyɛ ndzɛmba yi dɛm mfa mbɔ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE."
"Na sɛ ɔhɔho bi soɛ hom mu
column3: anaa obiara a ɔwɔ hom mu wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu no
column4: na ɔbɔbɔ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ama EWURADZE no; dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ no

column2: "Bagua no
column3: ahyɛdze kor na ɔnda hɔ mma hom na ɔhɔho a ɔbɔsoɛ hom mu no
column4: ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu: dɛ mbrɛ hom tse no
column5: dɛmara so na ɔhɔho no nyɛ wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Mbra kor nye ɔmom kor na ɔnda hɔ mma hom
column3: nye ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hom mu nyina."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ hom du asaase a medze hom rokɔ do no do a
column9: sɛ hom ridzi asaase no do edziban no bi a
column10: hom mbɔ ohim afɔr mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Hom mbɔrkan no bi ne tatar na hom mfa nyɛ ohim afɔr: dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ ewuporoweebea ohim afɔr no
column3: dɛmara so na hom nhim no."

column2: "Hom mbɔrkan no bi na hom mfa mma EWURADZE dɛ ohim afɔr wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu."
"Na sɛ hom fom
column3: na hom annhyɛ mbransɛm yi a EWURADZE aka akyerɛ Moses no nyinara nsew
column5: "mekyerɛ dza EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do ahyɛ hom nyinara
column6: ofi da a EWURADZE hyɛɛ mbra no
column7: na ɔdze ba yi wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu no a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔba dɛ
column3: sɛ wɔyɛ no ntɔgon mu
column5: mboanofo no nyinara mfa ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE
column7: nye no nom afɔr no ho dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse
column8: nye apɔnkyenyin kor na ɔnyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma Israelmba mboanofo no nyina
column3: na wɔdze bɛkyɛ hɔn; na ɔyɛ mfom
column5: wɔdze hɔn ayɛyɛdze aba dɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr
column6: nye hɔn bɔn ho afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "na wɔdze befir Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara
column3: nye ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hɔn mu no; na ɔman no nyinara afamu na wɔyɛɛ no ntɔgon mu."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa kor bi annhyɛ da na ɔyɛ bɔn a
column3: ɔno ɔmfa apɔnkyeber a oedzi afrenhyia mbra mbɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma ɔkra a ɔfom no
column3: sɛ ɔyɛ bɔn no ber a ɔnndze enyidaho wɔ EWURADZE enyim a
column4: ɔmpata mma no; na wɔdze bɛkyɛ no."

column2: "Hom nnya mbra kor nto hɔ mma nyia ɔyɛ biribi a ɔnndze enyidaho dɛ ɔyɛ okuromnyi wɔ Israelmba mu
column3: anaa ɔhɔho a ɔbɔsoɛ hom mu no."

column2: "Ɔkra a ɔhyɛ da ara yɛ bɔn no dze
column3: sɛ ɔyɛ okuromnyi bi o
column5: oedzi etsia EWURADZE; na dɛm ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Osiandɛ oebu EWURADZE n’asɛm enyimtsia
column3: na ɔato ne mbra no; otwa ara na wobotwa ɔkra no akyen

column2: "Na aber a Israelmba wɔwɔ sar no do no
column3: wohun ɔbanyin bi a ɔrepɛ nyena ahomgyeda."

column2: "Na hɔn a wohun no dɛ ɔrepɛ nyena no wɔdze no brɛɛ Moses nye Aaron
column3: nye mboanofo no nyinara."

column2: "Na wɔbɔɔ no dua mu
column3: osiandɛ wonnyae nnkyerɛɛ dza wɔmfa nyɛ no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Oku na wonku banyin no: mboanofo no nyinara nsiw no abo wɔ nseraban no ekyir."

column2: "Na mboanofo no nyinara dze no baa nseraban no ekyir na wosiiw no abo ma owui; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: na hyɛ hɔn ma wɔnyɛ hɔn ntar ano ndwow wɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nyina mu
column6: na wɔmfa bibir ahoma nsusuo n’ano n’ano ndwow no mu:"

column2: "na ɔnyɛ ndwow mma hom
column3: ma hom aahwɛ
column5: na wɔaayɛ; na hom eennkekyin enndzi hom akoma nye hom enyiwa ekyir
column6: dza hom tɔ dɛ wodzi ekyir ndwamanyɛ mu no:"

column2: "ama hom aakaa na wɔayɛ me mbransɛm nyinara
column3: na hom ayɛ krɔnkrɔn ama hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do dɛ mebɛyɛ hom Nyankopɔn no: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."
